org.description: The organization name. The name is not case sensitive.

tool_name.description: The name of the tool used to generate the code scanning analysis.

tool_guid.description: The GUID of the tool used to generate the code scanning analysis, if provided in the uploaded SARIF data.

before.description: A cursor, as given in the [Link header](https://docs.github.com/rest/guides/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api#using-link-headers). If specified, the query only searches for results before this cursor. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

after.description: A cursor, as given in the [Link header](https://docs.github.com/rest/guides/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api#using-link-headers). If specified, the query only searches for results after this cursor. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

page.description: The page number of the results to fetch. For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100). For more information, see "[Using pagination in the REST API](https://docs.github.com/rest/using-the-rest-api/using-pagination-in-the-rest-api)."

direction.description: The direction to sort the results by.

state.description: State of a code scanning alert.

sort.description: The property by which to sort the results.

severity.description: Severity of a code scanning alert.
